metadata.title: DigiMedia Optimizer
metadata.description: AI-powered SEO and SMO optimization for your digital presence.

keywordAnalyzer.title: AI Keyword Analyzer
keywordAnalyzer.description: Enter a website URL to discover relevant SEO and SMO keywords, powered by AI.

results.title: Analysis Results
results.description: Here are the suggested keywords and insights for the analyzed website.

keywordAnalyzer.error: An error occurred while analyzing the website. Please try again.

contentOptimizer.title: AI Content Optimizer
contentOptimizer.description: Paste your website content and target keywords to get AI-powered optimization advice.

form.keywordsPlaceholder: e.g., digital marketing, SEO, social media

results.title: Optimization Report
results.description: Here are the AI's recommendations for your content.
results.placeholderDescription: Fill out the form to get started.

contentOptimizer.error: An error occurred while optimizing the content. Please try again.

socialMediaGenerator.title: AI Social Media Post Generator
socialMediaGenerator.description: Provide some content from your website to generate engaging social media posts.

form.contentPlaceholder: Paste a blog post, product description, or any other content here...

socialMediaGenerator.error: An error occurred while generating posts. Please try again.

comingSoon.title: Feature Coming Soon
comingSoon.competitorAnalyzer: This tool will allow you to enter competitor domains and receive a detailed analysis of their SEO and content marketing efforts, helping you identify opportunities and refine your own strategy for digimediakomunika.cloud.

competitorAnalyzerPage.title: Competitor Analyzer
competitorAnalyzerPage.description: Gain insights into your competitors' strategies by analyzing their keywords and content.

googleAnalyticsPage.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalyticsPage.setupCompleteDescription: Google Analytics has been successfully configured. It may take up to 48 hours for data to start appearing in your Google Analytics dashboard.

googleAdsensePage.title: Google Adsense
googleAdsensePage.description: Integration and optimization suggestions for Google Adsense.
googleAdsensePage.setupCompleteDescription: Google AdSense has been successfully configured and Auto Ads are enabled. Ads will begin to appear on your site as Google's crawlers review your pages. This may take a few hours to a few days.

googleSearchConsolePage.title: Google Search Console
googleSearchConsolePage.description: Monitor your site's performance in Google Search and get insights to improve your visibility.
googleSearchConsolePage.statusDescription: Your Google Search Console verification tag is in place. You can now complete the verification process.
googleSearchConsolePage.verificationMethodDescription: The HTML tag verification method is now configured. Google will find this tag in your site's header to confirm your ownership.
googleSearchConsolePage.htmlFileMethodDescription: The verification tag has been added to your site's header. Proceed with the verification on the Google Search Console website.

youtubeOptimizationPage.title: AI YouTube Video Generator
youtubeOptimizationPage.description: Turn your website content or articles into engaging video scripts with AI-generated narration and visuals.

form.contentPlaceholder: Paste your blog post, article, or any other content here...

results.loadingTitle: AI is creating your video assets...
results.loadingDescription: This process involves generating a script and audio, so it may take a minute.
results.title: Video Asset Package

youtubeOptimizationPage.error: An error occurred while generating video assets. Please try again.

feedPreview.title: YouTube Channel Preview
feedPreview.description: See a preview of how your videos could look on your channel.

instagramOptimizationPage.title: AI Instagram Post Generator
instagramOptimizationPage.description: Turn your content into engaging Instagram posts with AI-generated captions, hashtags, and image ideas.

results.loadingTitle: AI is creating your Instagram posts...
results.title: Generated Instagram Posts
results.caption: Caption

instagramOptimizationPage.error: An error occurred while generating Instagram posts. Please try again.

feedPreview.title: Instagram Feed Preview
feedPreview.description: See how your generated posts might look on your profile.
